name: dmelearn/crawler
description: Crawl all internal links found on a website. Originally based on spatie/crawler 2.x

suggest.tightenco/collect: If using Laravel 7.0 or ealier. The Tightenco Collect package (^5.0|^6.0|^7.0|^8.0|^9.0).
suggest.illuminate/collections: If using Laravel 8.0 or newer. The Illuminate Collections package (^8.0|^9.0|^10.0).
